channel.title: mycatalog updates
channel.description: 'My Catalog' uses the IBM Cloud catalog API to retrieve data from the catalog. It attempts to be as accurate as possible. This feed shows additions, updates, removals from the catalog. Use with care. It is a work-in-progress :)

item.title: [updated] watsonx.data intelligence (datacatalog) has changed the description of the plan named essentials
item.description:
*before*: The Essentials plan includes core capabilities to automatically discover, profile, enrich, analyze data lineage and quality, and share data products as you begin to establish a data-centric organization., *after*: The Essentials plan includes core capabilities to automatically discover, profile, enrich, analyze data lineage and quality, and share data products as you begin to establish a data-centric organization.
This plan is restricted to the above capabilities and quantities.
Capacity Unit Hours are used in metadata import, metadata enrichment and data preparation.

item.title: [updated] watsonx.data intelligence (datacatalog) has changed the description of the plan named premium
item.description:
*before*: The Premium plan provides a comprehensive set of tools for advanced data discovery, cataloging, governance, quality, lineage and data product hub, augmented by Gen AI. Access to IBM Knowledge Accelerators is also included., *after*: The Premium plan provides a comprehensive set of tools for advanced data discovery, cataloging, governance, quality, lineage and data product hub, augmented by Gen AI. Access to IBM Knowledge Accelerators is also included. To enable unstructured data governance capabilities (where available), you must separately acquire the following services: watsonx.ai Studio, watsonx.ai Runtime, watsonx.data integration and watsonx.data.
This plan offers the flexibility to use the Resource Units for any of the included capabilities.

item.title: [updated] watsonx.data intelligence (datacatalog) has changed the description of the plan named standard-v3
item.description:
*before*: The Standard plan includes advanced capabilities in data governance, quality, lineage and data product hub. Access to IBM Knowledge Accelerators is also included., *after*: The Standard plan includes advanced capabilities in data governance, quality, lineage and data product hub. Access to IBM Knowledge Accelerators is also included.
This plan offers the flexibility to use the Resource Units for any of the included capabilities.

item.title: [updated] watsonx.data intelligence (datacatalog) has changed the description of the plan named trial
item.description:
*before*: This plan provides you with a free 30-day trial of watsonx.data intelligence to explore the full set of integrated and AI-powered capabilities to deliver trusted data to support your business and AI initiatives.
**Trial plan services, including all data and assets, are deleted after 30 days.**, *after*: The Trial plan provides you with a free 30-day trial of watsonx.data intelligence to explore the full set of integrated and AI-powered capabilities to deliver trusted data to support your business and AI initiatives.
This plan is restricted to the above capabilities and quantities.
Capacity Unit Hours are used in metadata import, metadata enrichment and data preparation.
To enable unstructured data governance capabilities (where available), you must separately acquire the following services: watsonx.ai Studio, watsonx.ai Runtime, watsonx.data integration and watsonx.data.
**Trial plan services, including all data and assets, are deleted after 30 days.**

item.title: [updated] Match 360 with Watson (mdm-oc) has a new plan named lite
item.description: This plan provides you with a free 30-day trial of IBM Match 360, a multi-domain operational and analytical master data management (MDM) service that delivers at scale an integrated and consolidated view of critical enterprise data across data silos, leveraging intelligent and tunable data matching and entity resolution as well as management of other related entities across the enterprise. Trial plan services are deleted after 30 days

item.title: [updated] Match 360 with Watson (mdm-oc) has removed the plan named lite-dev
